snippet: Retreats at the monastery of the Society of Saint John the Evangelist provide a contemplative, prayerful respite from the cacophony of the secular world.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column observes that the monastery of the Society of Saint John the Evangelist, located in Cambridge, Mass, offers retreats for those who want a contemplative, prayerful respite from the cacophony of the secular world.
lead_paragraph: Retreats at the monastery of the Society of Saint John the Evangelist provide a contemplative, prayerful respite from the cacophony of the secular world.

headline.print_headline: A Refuge So Quiet, God’s Whisper Can Be Heard
headline.seo: A Refuge Silent Enough to Hear God’s Whisper: On Religion
